alert.note: Alert for Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 29 at 4:49PM CDT until May 29 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Deep South Texas, including the following county, Hidalgo. * WHEN...Until 545 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 449 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Progreso, Progreso City Offices, Progreso High School, Llano Grande, Estero Llano Grande State Park, Villa Verde, Relampago, Scissors, Mcallen, Progreso Lakes, Lion Lake, Moon Lake and Progreso International Bridge. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
